{{velocity output="false"}} #macro(filterDescriptorForm $descriptor $id) #foreach($descriptor in $descriptor.properties) #if ($id) #set($descriptorId = "${id}_descriptor_${descriptor.id}") #else #set($descriptorId = "descriptor_${descriptor.id}") #end
$descriptor.description #if($descriptor.type.name)$descriptor.type.name#{else}$descriptor.type#end #if ($descriptor.type.getName() == 'org.xwiki.filter.output.OutputTarget') Supported format is file:<path in server> (e.g. file:/home/myuser/target.xml). When empty it send a file named target to the browser. #elseif ($descriptor.type.getName() == 'org.xwiki.filter.input.InputSource') Supported formats are file:<path in server> (e.g. file:/home/myuser/target.ext) and url:<url> (e.g. url:http://myserver/some/file/to/parse.ext). When empty it read the request input stream. #end
## TODO: design a real framework to generate form by type #if (($descriptor.defaultValue || "$!descriptor.defaultValue" != '') && ($descriptor.type.getName() == 'boolean' || $descriptor.type.getName() == 'int' || $descriptor.type.getName() == 'java.lang.String')) #else #end
#end #end {{/velocity}} {{velocity wiki=false}} #if ($xcontext.action == 'get' && $request.type) #if ($request.input == 'true') #filterDescriptorForm($services.filter.getInputFilterStreamDescriptor($request.type), $request.id) #else #filterDescriptorForm($services.filter.getOutputFilterStreamDescriptor($request.type), $request.id) #end #end {{/velocity}}
